subject: assert
msgSnippet: Can I check assert with boolean values. assertEquals(boolean,boolean) instead of using standard string values
messageBody:
Can I check assert with boolean values.
assertEquals(boolean,boolean) instead of using standard string values



Thomas SMETS wrote:

> I'm trying to write the test for a application that has JavaBeans as
> it's main interfaces (It will therefore be usable in Component enabled
> IDE). The probleme is that to thoroughly test the code I'm willing to
> have the setMethods() returing the value set.
>
> Does that "counter spoke" somehow the JavaBean specs jeopardizing the
> project thorough JavaBean compliance ?
>
> Rgds,
